name: Rheingold
description:
Version 1.1

Synopsis
When the young Dragon Prince Herbert receives a magic lamp, he encounters the djinni Aqila and makes a wish that will change his life—and the fate of his entire kingdom—forever.

A short, charming visual novel with a fairy tale theme.

  •  You play the role of Prince Herbert's bodyguard and childhood friend. MC name is customizable.
  • +10,000 words
  • 3 male NPCs, 1 female NPC
  • 10 CG Scenes
  • 4 unique endings
  • SFW with some light romance themes

Developer's Notes 

  • Customized GUI and Main Menu (a little~)
  • Tweaked Textbox and Quick Menu
  • Updated all CGs
  • Added Gallery and Music Room
  • Fixed some typos / grammar in script

Main storyline is complete and ready for Beta Testing. Any feedback is appreciated as it will help me not only consider what I can do to improve this project but future ones as well.

I'm not accepting donations at this time, but if you like my art and would like to support me, consider commissioning me in the future. It will help me continue making a living off of doing what I love ~

https://www.deviantart.com/goddess-of-gales/art/Commissions-Summer-2021-OPEN-738...

If you can't afford a commission, then consider sharing this project with anyone you think might enjoy it. Being able to share my work with others is what keeps me motivated to create fun projects like this one ~

Thanks for playing ~ : )

If you enjoyed the visual novel, you can follow me on Deviant Art or twitter for future updates on this and other visual novels I'm working on:

https://www.deviantart.com/goddess-of-gales

https://twitter.com/GalesGoddess

I love both making and playing visual novels as a hobby ~
Feel free to share any of your VN ideas or projects with me! ^_^

~ Fill out the survey below to get your name/username in the credits as an official Beta Tester ~

Beta Testing Survey

1. Were you able to finish the VN? If so which of the four character endings did you get?

2. What impressed you the most about the VN? Why is it your favorite?

3. What impressed you the least? Why is it your least favorite?

4. Do you have a favorite/least favorite character? What do you like/dislike about them?

5. Was the VN's layout easy to follow? Did you feel a need for more explanation on how to work the controls / play the game?

6. Are there any additional features you'd like to see added to the game?

7. Based on this VN, how interested would you be in playing future VNs that I make?

8. Have you or do you plan on unlocking all four of the available endings?

9. Do you prefer VNs where the protagonist has a unique character design/personality? Or do you prefer the MC's looks/personality to be left open to the player's imagination?

10. Feel free to add anything else you'd like to comment on.

11. Would you like your real name or username to be put in the game's credits?

Thanks for your support ~ :D
